channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists discover how a cup of hot chocolate could actually be good for us when we’re stressed
item.description: Some forms of hot chocolate appear to tackle stress and boost heart health while others don’t and now researchers at Birmingham University have reveal...

item.title: How a 200-year-old book sparked conspiracies about a time-travelling Trump
item.description: 'Little Baron Trump's' adventures in Russia were the focus of a series of 19th century books- sound familiar?

item.title: NHS says take this everyday pill if you're having a heart attack
item.description: Having some at home might be a wise move, as it could make a difference in an emergency

item.title: Black Friday shoppers on high alert over new scam warning that threatens to steal millions

item.title: Something very strange happens when you search for Boroughbridge on Facebook
item.description: Good luck catching up on the local gossip.

item.title: Mysterious ‘doomsday fish’ washes ashore in California for second time this year
item.description: A rare 12-foot oarfish was found off the Southern California coast.

item.title: The weird reason a huge skyscraper has been built in the middle of a forest
item.description: It is almost as tall as London's Shard.

item.title: Who do you think this ‘greedy human-faced fish’ called Bob looks like?
item.description: There's not a thought behind those eyes.

item.title: 'I ate dinner in Bridget Jones' flat – what happened during it was perfect'

item.title: Man Surrenders Nearly 1,000 Rodents To New Hampshire Shelter
item.description: The shelter now has an enor-mouse problem on its hands.
